Key Match Events: The match was abandoned without a ball being bowled due to a wet outfield
Post-Match Reflections: India will face Afghanistan on Thursday in the Super Eight stage of the tournament
Canada's campaign has come to an end but they can look forward to an improved chance of making the 2026 T20 World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was called off due to wet outfield despite a passing drizzle
The ground at Lauderhill had taken enough water from the previous day's rain to be unfit for play
There were two inspections by the umpires before the match was abandoned
Canada's upset win over Ireland was a memorable moment in their campaign
